Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two students holding cups with a string connecting them, indicating an attempt to show a string telephone.
Illustrate that the purpose of the string telephone is for communication, possibly by drawing lines or waves from the students' mouths to the cups.
Show the string as an important part of the connection, although it may not be tight or straight.
CANNOT: Consistently draw the string tight, showing an understanding that it needs to be stretched for sound to travel effectively *(may show slack without realizing its impact)*.
Clearly depict how the string helps send communication over a distance, such as sound waves traveling along lines *(may lack directional arrows or indication of sound transfer)*.
Include features like resonant cups or any additional sound-related mechanisms in the drawing *(often not included at this level)*.
Explain or illustrate how the string telephone solves the problem of distant communication through detailed labeling or complex illustration.
